top_questions.text: A sequential data file, "record.dat." contains several records with data items name, address, age, and phone number. Write a program to display the records of students whose age is greater than or equal to 18. [4]
Which data type is used in MS-Access to store address of a person?​

Write down the output of the given programs. Show with dry run in a table. [2] DECLARE SUB Display(S$)​ CLS​ S$="TOEPOHSDRA"​ CALL Display (S$)​ END SUB Display(S$)​ LET I=48​ FOR C=1 TO 4​ P=I MOD 7​ R$=R$+ MID$(S$, P, 1)​ I=I-1​ NEXT C​ PRINT R$​ END SUB
